rooms.description: Spacious contemporary living room with a large window for natural light, designed to be wheelchair accessible.
Adjacent to the living room, open concept dining area ensuring smooth circulation.
Fully equipped modern kitchen with lower countertops and accessible design for wheelchair users; ample storage space.
Separate living area for the servant quarters, including a bedroom and small living area.
Accessible bathroom with grab bars and non-slip tiles.

openings.description: Wheelchair-accessible garage with designated parking space.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, designed for optimum privacy and comfort. Includes features like lowered windows to enhance accessibility.
Secondary bedroom ensuring ample space for family members; includes a closet area.
Large en-suite bathroom with wheelchair accessible design, non-slip surfaces and adequate grab bars.
Contemporary study room ensuring natural light and ergonomic furniture arrangements in accordance with Vastu principles.

openings.description: A wide, gently sloping staircase along with an alternative ramp for wheelchair access between floors.
Balcony designed to maximize morning sunlight following Vastu principles.

additional_features.description: Integrated outdoor swimming pool with wheelchair-accessible entry and safety features, located in the backyard as per local norms and Vastu guidelines.
Shared common area with seating arrangement designed for both family relaxation and social gatherings; ensures accessibility for wheelchair users.
